name: Time Input
description: Clock mode triggers at specific time, Metronome mode pulses at intervals
author: Interactor Team

targetTime.description: Target time in 12-hour format (e.g., 2:30 PM) - Clock mode only

millisecondDelay.description: Delay between pulses in milliseconds - Metronome mode only

events.name: timeTrigger
events.description: Emitted when target time is reached (Clock mode) or on pulse (Metronome mode)
